story: Just a curious human who turned a love for color, shape, and typography into a daily habit. Now I build impactful visual identities and branding that usually resonate—and when a design brief is challenging, I solve it faster than you can say 'revisions are ready'.

timeline.event: Started a Bachelor of Commerce at RR Mehta College of Science & CL Parikh College of Commerce, building a strong foundation in business and commerce.
Pursued a Master’s in Computer Application at S.K. Patel Institute of Management and Computer Studies, Gandhinagar, gaining technical and analytical skills.
Began exploring graphic design through personal projects and completed a Graphic Designer Internship at The Data Sequence.
Working at Trakky Techno Services Pvt. Ltd. as a Graphic Designer & Customer Service Executive, contributing to branding, marketing creatives, and user engagement.
